A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Movie was very good\, even with the walrus woman milking incident\, until the last 10 minutes.  Force projection is cool\, but not in this situation\, and then just dying\, or basically the greatest Jedi left in the galaxy committing suicide because he is tired.  I was hoping Looper was just bad due to Johnson being a rookie director\, but.......
